snippet: Facing bad publicity, big banks are highlighting what has quietly become a hot growth area in recent years — backing so-called green companies and renewable energy projects.
abstract: Big banks, facing bad publicity, are highlighting what has quietly become a hot growth area in recent years--backing so-called green companies and renewable energy projects; Bank of America is announcing a 10-year, $50 billion energy initiative.
lead_paragraph: Facing bad publicity, big banks are highlighting what has quietly become a hot growth area in recent years — backing so-called green companies and renewable energy projects.

headline.seo: Banks Look to Burnish Their Images by Backing Green Technology Firms
headline.main: Banks Look to Burnish Their Images by Backing Green Technology Firms
headline.print_headline: Banks Look to Burnish Their Images by Backing Green Technology Firms
